title: Crusted tuna with pineapple relish

For the relish: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Dip the tuna steak in the egg white and then coat in sesame seeds.
Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan and fry the tuna for 2-3 minutes on each side, or to personal taste.
For the relish, place the fresh mint and coriander in a bowl. Add the oil, caster sugar, lime juice, pineapple and salt and freshly ground black pepper. Toss together to coat.
To serve, transfer the crusted tuna to a serving plate and spoon the relish alongside.
